title: Federated Learning Framework for Edge Devices
description: An open-source framework for deploying federated learning models on resource-constrained edge devices with privacy-preserving mechanisms and adaptive aggregation strategies. Implements multi-dimensional reputation system for robust client reliability.

title: AutoStreamPipe - LLM-Assisted Stream Processing
description: Automatic generation of data stream processing pipelines using large language models. Enables developers to create complex streaming applications through natural language descriptions.
technologies: Python, Apache Flink, LLMs, Docker, Kubernetes

title: Splitwise - Edge-Cloud LLM Inference
description: Collaborative edge-cloud inference system for large language models using Lyapunov-assisted deep reinforcement learning for optimal model splitting and resource allocation.

title: GAP - Game Theory-based Fog Computing
description: Game theory-based approach for reliability and power management in emerging fog computing environments with dynamic workload adaptation.

title: MOTICPS - Multi-Objective Task Scheduling
description: Energy optimization framework for multi-objective task scheduling in IoT-integrated cyber-physical systems with real-time constraints.

title: Levy Walk-based Edge Scheduler
description: Novel scheduling framework for power-intensive mobile edge computing tasks using Levy Walk optimization for improved energy efficiency.
